messages.content: You are an assistant that helps developers execute specific actions on web pages using Playwright commands.
How do I click the first 'All Products' link on the page?
await page.getByRole('link', \{ name: 'All Products' \}).first().click();
How do I click on an image element named after the product variable?
await page.getByRole('img', { name: product }).click();
How can I call the function addAndViewCart with page as its argument?
await addAndViewCart(page);
How do I ensure the product text is visible on the page?
await expect(page.getByText(product)).toBeVisible();
How do I click the first 'Laptops' link on the page?
await page.getByRole('link', { name: 'Laptops' }).first().click();
How do I click on the 'Buy Now' button?
await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Buy Now' }).click();
How do I navigate to a specified URL?
await page.goto('https://cloudtesting.contosotraders.com/');
How do I click on the 'Add To Bag' button?
await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Add To Bag' }).click();
How do I check a checkbox?
locator.check()
How do I ensure an element is visible?
expect(locator).toBeVisible()
What command do I use to set a timeout for a single action, like going to a page?
await page.goto('https://playwright.dev', { timeout: 30000 });
You are an assistant that helps developers execute specific actions on web pages using Playwright commands.
How do I click on an image element named after the product variable?
await page.getByRole('img', { name: product }).click();
How can I call the function addAndViewCart with page as its argument?
await addAndViewCart(page);
How do I ensure the product text is visible on the page?
await expect(page.getByText(product)).toBeVisible();
How do I click on the 'Buy Now' button?
await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Buy Now' }).click();
Can you repeat how to call the function addAndViewCart with page as its argument?
await addAndViewCart(page);
How do I check if the text for 'Xbox Wireless Controller Lunar Shift Special Edition' is visible on the page?
await expect(page.getByText('Xbox Wireless Controller Lunar Shift Special Edition')).toBeVisible();
You are an assistant that helps developers execute specific actions on web pages using Playwright commands.
How do I click on an image element named after the product variable?
await page.getByRole('img', { name: product }).click();
How can I call the function addAndViewCart with page as its argument?
await addAndViewCart(page);
How do I ensure the product text is visible on the page?
await expect(page.getByText(product)).toBeVisible();
How do I click on the 'Buy Now' button?
await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Buy Now' }).click();
Can you repeat how to call the function addAndViewCart with page as its argument?
await addAndViewCart(page);
How do I check if the text for 'Xbox Wireless Controller Lunar Shift Special Edition' is visible on the page?
await expect(page.getByText('Xbox Wireless Controller Lunar Shift Special Edition')).toBeVisible();
You are an assistant that helps developers execute specific actions on web pages using Playwright commands.
How do I navigate to a specified URL?
await page.goto('https://cloudtesting.contosotraders.com/');
How do I click on the 'Add To Bag' button?
await page.getByRole('button', { name: 'Add To Bag' }).click();
How do I click on the element labeled 'cart'?
await page.getByLabel('cart').click();
How can I check if a checkbox is checked?
expect(locator).toBeChecked()
How do I ensure a control is enabled?
expect(locator).toBeEnabled()
You are an assistant that helps developers verify web page elements using Playwright assertions.
How can I check if an element contains specific text?
expect(locator).toContainText()
How do I verify if an element has a specific attribute?
expect(locator).toHaveAttribute()
What command should I use to check if a list of elements has a given length?
expect(locator).toHaveCount()
How can I check if an element's text matches expected text?
expect(locator).toHaveText()
You are an assistant trained to guide users in verifying and interacting with web elements using Playwright.
How can I check if an input element has a specific value?
expect(locator).toHaveValue()
How do I verify that the page has the correct title?
expect(page).toHaveTitle()
What's the command to check if the page URL matches an expected URL?
expect(page).toHaveURL()
How can I check a checkbox on the page?
locator.check()
What should I do to click on a specific element?
locator.click()
You are an assistant trained to guide developers in interacting with web elements using Playwright.
How can I uncheck an input checkbox?
locator.uncheck()
What command should I use to hover the mouse over an element?
locator.hover()
How do I fill a form field with text?
locator.fill()
What's the method to focus on an element?
locator.focus()
How can I simulate pressing a single key?
locator.press()
You are an assistant designed to help developers manipulate and interact with web elements using Playwright.
How can I pick files to upload?
locator.setInputFiles()
How do I select an option from a dropdown menu?
locator.selectOption()
How can I set a timeout for navigating to a new page?
await page.goto('https://playwright.dev', { timeout: 30000 });
What about setting a timeout for clicking on a button?
await page.getByText('Get Started').click({ timeout: 10000 });
